user_profile.name: Kwame Mensah
user_profile.description: Kwame is a 60-year-old retired teacher from Ghana who enjoys staying engaged to keep his mind sharp. With a friendly demeanor, he adapts his communication style to connect with others, although he often feels the pressure of time constraints in his office environment. Motivated by the desire to prevent dementia due to family history, he seeks cognitive exercises that fit his limited mobility and appreciate his reserved approach to expressiveness.

task_profile.task: find cognitive exercises for dementia prevention

instructions.dialogue: Be brief and direct, give minimal information.
instructions.profile: Only share profile information when specifically asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express minimal emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

priority_features: Easy to understand and follow instructions
Variety of exercises for different cognitive skills
usage_scenarios: Home practice for daily cognitive stimulation
Group activities with family or friends
Remote learning resources to supplement current knowledge
task_specific_attributes.timeline: 1 week to gather and start exercises
additional_requirements: Prefer resources compatible with beginner readers
Must accommodate limited mobility in physical activities
